He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said. staff Chicago White Sox pitcher Mark Buehrle is raising eyebrows over his recent comments about Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Michael Vick , who has bounced back after being jailed for his role in a dogfighting ring in 2007. Good for America "I can appreciate the fact that Mike Pence 's unyielding right-wing voting record on literally every issue is appreciated by the far-right," The Washington Monthly's liberal Steve Benen says. But to say that the guy isn't ready for prime time is a dramatic understatement. Mike Pence has no areas of expertise, has no major pieces of legislation to his name, has demonstrated no working understanding of any area of public policy, and after spending five minutes watching him speak on any subject, it becomes clear that he's conspicuously unintelligent. Reacting to a story about the friendship between Debbie Walsh Wasserman-Schultz, Gabrielle Giffords , and Kirsten Gillibrand , Shani Hilton observes: It's good that the women who are there have been able to support one another, but this is a reminder that women haven't made many inroads in Congress - or the congressional leadership- in nearly a decade.
